Package org.daisy.braille.pef

Provides fundamental classes for dealing with PEF-files.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Element Provides an XML element data object.
PEFBook Provides metadata about a PEF-file.
PEFHandler Provides a handler for reading a PEF-file and sending the contents to an Embosser.
PEFHandler.Builder Provides a Builder for PEFHandler
PEFNamespaceContext Provides a NamespaceContext implementation for PEF 1.0.
PEFValidator  
Range Provides a range data object.
TextHandler Provides a handler for reading text and writing a PEF-file.
TextHandler.Builder Provides a Builder for TextHandler
 

Enum Summary

PEFHandler.AlignmentFallback

Package org.daisy.braille.pef Description

Provides fundamental classes for dealing with PEF-files.
